data.description: Data used to build the tree view.

minXOffset.description: The minimum horizontal offset of the nodes in pixels.

yOffset.description: The vertical offset of nodes in pixels.

lineWidth.description: The width of the line connecting the nodes in pixels.

connectionColor.description: The default color of the connection between nodes. (can be overwritten by node color using colorOutgoing)

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the component, used because the nodes draw over the node connections.

curveSize.description: The size of the curve, must be smaller or equal to half the x and y offset.

nodeSize.description: Width and height of 1 node in pixels.
